text: Ryan Neil Raburn (born April 17, 1981) is a former baseball player who last played for the Washington Nationals. He previously played for the Detroit Tigers, Cleveland Indians, and Colorado Rockies. He played many positions, but mostly second base and left field. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Colorado Rockies players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Washington Nationals players Category:Sportspeople from Tampa, Florida
title: Ryan Raburn
